results.name: I found the legendary weapon that made me a hero and i'm going to fight the demon lord in a dungeon with my team but...

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 98 or higher
  • Processor: Pentium II
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 256
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard beeps work just fine
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-10900K Processor
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 Founders Edition
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Z
